channel.title: Self-Supervised Learning on Michelia'Log
channel.description: Recent content in Self-Supervised Learning on Michelia'Log

item.title: Paper Notes - Self-Supervised Learning
item.description: Why self-supervised learning: 主要的问题在于获取数据及其标注部分. Definition: Self-supervised learning is a method that poses the following question to formulate an unsupervised learning problem as a supervised one: “Can we design the task in such a way that we can generate virtually unlimited labels from our existing images and use that to learn the representations?” Replace
